query:
SELECT p.id, p.userId, p.firstName, p.lastName, p.email, p.courseId, c.name as courseName, u.email as userEmail
FROM participants p 
LEFT JOIN users u ON p.userId = u.id
LEFT JOIN courses c ON p.courseId = c.id
WHERE u.email LIKE '%sachs%' OR p.email LIKE '%sachs%'
ORDER BY p.id DESC
LIMIT 5;
command:

LEFT JOIN courses c ON p.courseId = c.id
WHERE u.email LIKE '%sachs%' OR p.email LIKE '%sachs%'
